findings.title: Unprotected approve Function
findings.description: The approve function is not properly protected and can lead to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Transfer Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The transfer function has a vulnerability.

findings.title: Unprotected Permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is marked as External and has a warning symbol, indicating potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The mint function is marked as External and has a warning symbol, indicating potential security risks.

findings.title: Burn Functionality
findings.description: The burn functionality is implemented through multiple private functions including useBnbToBurnKintaBnb, buyBackKintaBnbAndBurn, and buyBackAndBurn.

findings.title: Swap Function Vulnerability
findings.description: Potential vulnerability found in swap functions, which may lead to unintended behavior or security risks.

findings.title: Skim
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in skim function.

findings.title: Unprotected Sync Function
findings.description: The sync function does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables
findings.description: The constructor does not initialize state variables.

findings.title: _setupDecimals Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The _setupDecimals function has a potential vulnerability due to the lack of input validation or incorrect handling of decimal values.

findings.title: _beforeTokenTransfer
findings.description: The _beforeTokenTransfer function does not check if the 'from' address is the zero address before calling _transfer.
